alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 7:40PM CDT until May 18 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... South central Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Hill, or 13 miles southeast of Hurtsboro, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Hawkinsville and Twin Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
